overview: Joy Das is a professional Content Writer, working with a Software & Website Development Company, based in India. Drawn to this profession in response to his innate passion for writing. He loves writing on travels, current affairs, software development, website development, and the Internet world as a whole, among others. Previously, he was a freelance reporter with a national daily (The Times of India), besides teaching in a school. Content Writing is now his full-time profession. As for his academic qualifications, he did his graduation with major in English (B.A. Hons. in English), completed the B.Ed. (Bachelor of Education), and did the Post Graduation (PG Dip.) in Journalism.

degrees.subject: English (Hons.), B.Ed., PG Dip. in Journalism
